item.title: Performant Spatial Apps with PostGIS: 8 Years of Headâ€‘Banging
item.description: If you’ve read the title of the post and actually clicked this post I’m going to make an assumption that you are already someone who has technical knowledge in this domain, as such, this post will be quite technical and go into some of the most important things I’ve learnt over the last eight years.
